text: Area code 242 is the local telephone area code of the Bahamas. When in the Bahamas, a person needs only the seven-digit number to make a call. To call from anywhere within North America (the United States, Canada, etc.), simply dial 1-242 followed by the phone number. To make calls between different Islands in the Bahamas, the caller must also use 1-242. Category:Area codes Category:The Bahamas
title: Area code 242
